text: is the 4th single by Japanese idol girl group Keyakizaka46. It was released on 5 April 2017. It reached number-one on the weekly Oricon Singles Chart with 632,667 copies sold. It was also number-one on the Billboard Japan Hot 100. "Fukyōwaon" is a Japanese word that means "dissonance." The center (choreography center) position in the title track is held by Yurina Hirate. ==Track listing== ==Chart performance== ===Weekly=== Oricon {| class="wikitable" |- ! style="text-align:center;"|Chart ! style="text- align:center;"|Peak ! style="text-align:center;"|Debut Sales ! style="text- align:center;"|Sales Total |- |align="left"|Weekly Singles Chart | style="text-align:center;"| 1 | style="text-align:center;"| 632,667 |- |} Billboard Japan {| class="wikitable" |- ! style="text-align:center;"|Chart ! style="text-align:center;"|Peak |- |align="left"|Japan Hot 100 | style="text- align:center;"|1 |- |align="left"|Radio Songs | style="text-align:center;"| 4 |- |align="left"|Top Singles Sales | style="text-align:center;"| 1 |} ===Yearly=== Billboard Japan {| class="wikitable" |- ! style="text- align:center;"|Chart (2017) ! style="text-align:center;"|Peak |- |align="left"|Japan Hot 100 | style="text-align:center;"| 4 |- |align="left"|Download Song | style="text-align:center;"| 55 |- |align="left"|Steaming Song | style="text-align:center;"| 28 |- ! style="text- align:center;"|Chart (2018) ! style="text-align:center;"|Peak |- |align="left"|Japan Hot 100 | style="text-align:center;"| 50 |- |align="left"|Download Song | style="text-align:center;"| 92 |- |align="left"|Steaming Song | style="text-align:center;"| 22 |} ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * * == External links == * Discography on the official website of Keyakizaka46 * Category:2017 singles Category:2017 songs Category:J-pop songs Category:Japanese-language songs Category:Keyakizaka46 songs Category:Oricon Weekly number-one singles Category:Billboard Japan Hot 100 number-one singles Category:Sony Music Entertainment Japan singles Category:Song articles with missing songwriters
